bs-deferred-action-apiupload-description:
Description of an action that uploads a file to the wiki.

Parameters:
* $1 - The source file name
* $2 - The target file name
bs-uploader-mime-images-label: Label used in a drop down that allows filtering for certain file types. Filters for image file types.
bs-uploader-mime-files-label: Label used in a drop down that allows filtering for certain file types. Filters for all but image file types.
